Html:
Hi,

I have a question concerning the IEEE reference order sheet:

In my text I would like to reference more than one reference at a time, for instance:

"....according to [4] and [6]–[9]."

How can I do this ([6]-[9])? By adding  [6] and use "-" (minus) and then [9], the references [7] and [8] won't occure in the reference list beacuse Word thinks that they aren't used in the text.

And "....according to [4] and [6], [7], [8], [9]." is not conform to the IEEE standard.

By the way, I'm not totally sure if it should be [6]-[9] or [6-9]. I think the first version is correct.

 

Thank you!

You did a very great job with all the style sheets! It bears repeating. 

regards

Christian
